hints.content:
Every time we move right on the number line, we add the distance we move.

When we move left, we subtract.

$642\redD{+200}=842$

![The same number line as above, with the second point labeled 842](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/0b9179f1cfe56210f689e9892d0efb2a226d5902)

[[☃ explanation 1]]

Let's keep adding or subtracting to label the other points on the number line.

options.explanation: The number $\purpleD{30}$ is close to $29$, and Lyra can add it without regrouping.

hints.content:
$842\purpleD{+30}=872$

![The same number line as above, with the fourth point labeled 872](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/18ce716b51ee764d7248bac87024396ebb5a74cd)

[[☃ explanation 1]]

options.explanation:
The number $\purpleD{30}$ is $\greenD{1}$ more than $29$.

Lyra has to subtract (go back) because she added more than $29$.

hints.content:
$872\greenD{-1}=871$

![The same number line as above, with the third point labeled 871](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e3759013af0e0b94b27b0d320946a828d27cb0f7)

[[☃ explanation 1]]

This leads to the same sum because, altogether, that is a distance of:

$\redD{200}+\purpleD{30}\greenD{-1}= \blueD{229}$

![The same number line as above, with the long arrow labeled plus 229](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/770ec56f8c7bd6daf0e55d8b37a9dd2ab7114f89)

This is Lyra's completed number line:

![The completed number line labeled, from left to right: 642, 842, 871, and 872](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a453e43f5e9cc0a892b71d699b965ab003a13cae)

options.imageAlt: A number line with 4 marked points. The first and leftmost point is labeled 642. An arrow labeled plus 200 goes from the first point to the second point, labeled 842. An arrow labeled plus 30 goes from the second point to the fourth and rightmost point. An arrow labeled minus 1 goes back from the fourth point to the third point. A long arrow labeled plus 229 goes from 642 to the third point.

question.content:
Lyra thinks about $642+229$ as $642+200+30-1$ to solve in her head.

**Label the missing numbers on Lyra's number line to justify her thinking.** 

[[☃ label-image 1]]
